text: The 1962 Navy Midshipmen football team represented the United States Naval Academy (USNA) during the 1962 NCAA University Division football season. Navy competed as an independent with no conference affiliation. The team was led by fourth-year head coach Wayne Hardin. ==Schedule== ==Roster== ==References== Navy Midshipmen Category:Navy Midshipmen football seasons Navy Midshipmen
title: 1962 Navy Midshipmen football team
